means: 堆积，积累( accumulate的过去式和过去分词 )
（数量）逐渐增加，（质量）渐渐提高

sentence.Network_en: I accumulated a roomful of documents and tape recordings.
sentence.Network_cn: 我搜集了满屋子的文件和磁带录音。

sentence.Network_en: I seem to have accumulated a lot of books.
sentence.Network_cn: 我好像已经收集了很多书。

sentence.Network_en: All his accumulated nervous agitation was discharged on Maud like a thunderbolt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那蓄积已久的怒气,就像雷电般倾泻在莫德身上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Manual skills accumulated over the years created a strong technology ., 多年的手工技艺积淀造就了过硬的技术.
snow accumulated to a depth of five feet ., 雪已积到五尺深.
accumulated 总角, accumulated 积蓄的, accumulated 积累角

list.abs: 新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... accountant n. 会计 accumulate vt. 积累，累积 accusation n. 罪名，谴责.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... accretion ? v. 逐渐增长 accumulate ???? vi. 积聚 ,堆积 acerbic ? adj. 酸的.
Digital 是什么意思_爱问知识人 ... 镭射激光 laser 累积比累加器 accumulator 类比模拟 analog.
汽车专业英语词汇_百度文库 ... Accumulation wear average 累计平均磨耗 Accumulator 蓄能器，蓄电池 Accuracy 精度.

entry.def: When you accumulate things or when they accumulate, they collect or are gathered over a period of time.

example.ex: Households accumulate wealth across a broad spectrum of assets...
example.tran: 家庭在以各种各样的资产形式积累财富。

example.ex: Lead can accumulate in the body until toxic levels are reached.
example.tran: 铅会在体内积聚直至造成铅中毒。

means.word_mean: 1. brought together into a group or crowd;

auth_sentence.content: Corporate treasurers are being badgered to spend accumulated cash.
auth_sentence.res_content: Corporate treasurers are being badgered to spend accumulated cash.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Corporate treasurers are being badgered to spend accumulated cash.

auth_sentence.content: Visitors carry dosimeters to measure accumulated exposure to radiation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Visitors carry dosimeters to measure accumulated exposure to radiation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Visitors carry dosimeters to measure accumulated exposure to radiation.

auth_sentence.content: The collection was accumulated by the Wedgwood trading company.
auth_sentence.res_content: The collection was accumulated by the Wedgwood trading company.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The collection was accumulated by the Wedgwood trading company.

Sentence.sentence: The Big Three American carmakers need restructuring to survive because they cannot cope with the ruinous costs accumulated over the post-war years.
they have borrowed too heavily and accumulated too large amounts of debt
they cannot cope with the ruinous costs accumulated over the post-war years.

They practically beg a user to ignore the long-suffering professor struggling to pass on accumulated wisdom from the front of the room - a prospect that teachers find most irritating and students view as, well, inevitable.
